title: Kalvaria on global deal trends.
summary: Leon Kalvaria, Vice Chairman in Citi's Institutional Clients Group, spoke to CNBC about corporations' increasing appetite for M&A and capital expenditures as a way to achieve growth. He also covered trends in global M&A, including the rise in deal flow between emerging markets.
